name: In Your Mind (PSV Games Studio)
description:
In this game made by PSV Games Studio in 30 days for UPBGE Masterclass game jam you will need a lot of courage to face your subconscious and take control of your mind dominated by a deadly gas made by a mad scientist.

In the game you will be able to save your progress and continue later, also in the settings tab you will be able to choose which post-processes to use,, the resolution you want to play in and the language.

The game has language and dubbing in Portuguese and English.

If you like the game or not, leave your feedback, it helps me a lot to improve in game development.
